description: This file demonstrates how to set up and use an agent with personalized memory and session summaries, utilizing a PostgreSQL database with pgvector for storage.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Main class representing the agent that interacts with the user and manages memory and storage.

classes.name: PostgresMemoryDb
classes.description: Class for managing memory storage in a PostgreSQL database with pgvector.

classes.name: Memory
classes.description: Class representing the memory component of the agent, storing memories in a database.

classes.name: Claude
classes.description: Model class representing the Anthropic Claude language model.

classes.name: PostgresStorage
classes.description: Class for managing session storage in a PostgreSQL database.

methods.name: agent.print_response
methods.description: Method to output a response from the agent, optionally streaming the output.
